Posts.Content: my mom would get painful limps in her breasts fue to caffeine. She also had cysts before but nothing cancerous. I bet you are ok but it is always a good idea to check it out.
Posts.Title: Painful lump in breast. :( Mother died of BC in January.

Posts.Content: I know what you are talking about cuz my mom had the same thing. Don't worry I don't think it is cancer. I think they might be cysts that can be removed. She needs to ask her doctor though. Has she called her doc. yet to schedule an appointment?
Posts.Title: My girlfriend just showed me a lump on both breasts, please help.

Posts.Content: Hi I am sort of in the same position. My armpit is puffed up but when I feel for an actual lump I can't find any. The doctor told me it was mammary tissue that has migrated up there, that would explain why it doesn't hurt I guess. I don't think that when you get a mammogram they check the armpit. Lymph node swelling under the arm is usually a warning signal given from the breast anyways. I have never had one but probably need to since breast cancer runs in my family. Goodluck!
Posts.Title: Armpit lump - breast or lymph
